name: Victorious War
description: You're a member of an English gang that works for the Nazi party. Your gang took part in Operation Bernhard. When your gang ran out of money. You've been sent to a German-occupied territory to recollect counterfeit money. The money was located in a concentration camp. You've seen a lot of horrible things that they did to the prisoners and you refused to serve them any longer. You have angered your gang and the Nazi party, and they decided to "get rid of" you. They've done a horrible mistake, that their leader Adolf Hitler himself will be punished. After all, Hitler isn't going to kill himself.
